title: FT: Looking for trading partners for PSA cards
author: Thromdog

posts.post_title: FT: Looking for trading partners for PSA cards
posts.post_content:
Have these and several more available for trade. I’ve been in the process of upgrading non-EPDGs in my set to PSA 3-4 and still have several more to go. Hoping I can make some trades with folks here versus just buying and selling. 

Let me know if you have any available and let’s see if we can work something out.

Thanks
Jeff
